title: Birds
description: Students will love learning about their feathered friends, from familiar owls to exotic emus. Each page of text has interesting information and engaging photos.
meta: cockatoos, eagles, emu, hummingbirds, owls, pelican, puffin, roadrunner, toucan, vultures
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast text information
Segment and Blend Phonemes : Segment and blend phonemes

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
